resources:
English in IT Welcome to our application!
Here you can learn some IT vocabulary in English
How do you want to learn? Term to definition Definition to term (default) NEXT PREV 0/100 term_or_def Select difficulty Easy Medium Hard Start Congratulations, you won!\n Your score is:
Happy teddy saying congratulations Return to main menu Play again start playing start learning START!! FallingCometGame Dummy Button DUMMY\nCONTENT falling comet image Your answerfinish Submit Game Over! Here you can create your own learning sets containing some terms of your choice. + New set You have 0 learning sets. Edit Delete This is set name This is a number of sets you have new set name Finish Add some terms to your new set by clicking on a chosen term from the list below. Add terms Click on a selected word to add it to your set. SAVE Term Definition of a term might be a looong definition lalalala defining some term, definition could be long or shorter
